verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In yet another press gaggle] , [ARG0: Trump] [V: repeated] [ARG1: the outright lie that the law requires separating children from their parents if they reach the border] and used blatant and substanceless fearmongering to justify the policy . He ’s having a hard time coming up with a coherent rationale for this , to say the least . President Trump remained resistant …
